煽.definition: to fan into a flame; to incite

煽動顛覆國家政權.pinyin: shan1 dong4 dian1 fu4 guo2 jia1 zheng4 quan2
煽動顛覆國家政權.definition: incitement to subvert state power (criminal charge used to gag free speech)

煽動顛覆國家罪.pinyin: shan1 dong4 dian1 fu4 guo2 jia1 zui4
煽動顛覆國家罪.definition: crime of conspiring to overthrow the state

煽情.definition: to stir up emotion; to arouse sympathy; moving

煽風點火.definition: (idiom) to fan the flames; to incite people; to stir up trouble
